taxonomicnotes: Hamilton (1822) described Cyprinus rasbora from Bengal. Brittan (1972) treated the species as Rasbora rasbora.
rationale: Rasbora rasbora is a widely distributed fish which breeds easily. There are no major threats to this species and so assessed as Least Concern.
evaluator: Barbhuiya, A.H., Juffe Bignoli, D., Rema Devi, K.R., Dahanukar, N. & Chaudhry, S.
